LanguageData.LRE_AbsorbQiHediff.label: 炼化
LanguageData.LRE_AbsorbQiHediff.description: 修仙者正在炼化得到的炼化值，每小时炼化一次，如果修仙者境界已满，炼化值会1:10转化为灵气，修炼者当前存储的炼化值越多，承受的负面效果越大。
LanguageData.LRE_AbsorbQiHediff.stages._1.label: 轻盈
LanguageData.LRE_AbsorbQiHediff.stages._2.label: 紧张
LanguageData.LRE_AbsorbQiHediff.stages._3.label: 急促
LanguageData.LRE_AbsorbQiHediff.stages._4.label: 恰满
LanguageData.LRE_AbsorbQiHediff.stages._5.label: 溢满
LanguageData.LRE_AbsorbQiHediff.stages._6.label: 盆满
LanguageData.LRE_AbsorbQiHediff.stages._7.label: 欲裂
